description: The duffel bag is an affordable yet heavy-duty, soft-side luggage type, sold with or without wheels. Both types have a tough outer layer like ripstop nylon or canvas.

products.name: North Face Base Camp Duffel
products.description: Durable non-wheeled duffel, great for rugged adventures.

products.name: Eagle Creek Cargo Hauler
products.description: Compact and lightweight, perfect for weekend trips.

products.name: REI Co-op Roadtripper Duffel
products.description: Budget-friendly duffel for short road trips or gym sessions.
